name: ibis_linux_2.6b4
description: Compile IBIS by typing '**make ibis**' in the directory which contains the ibis FORTRAN code.  However, before doing so, you may need to edit makefile so that the **F77_OPTIONS**, **INCLUDE_DIRS**, and **LD_OPTIONS_NETCDF** match those on your computer.  The executable will be named 'ibisnetcdf'.  You may move the executable to the directory in which your input/output directories exist.  If so, be sure to move ibis.infile and diag.infile there too.
